alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:18PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greene, northwestern Lenoir and central Pitt Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1018 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bell Arthur to 6 miles north of Goldsboro. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Winterville, Ayden, Farmville, Grifton, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Black Jack, Dawson, Institute, Jason, Maury, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Lizzie, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University, Kinston Regional Jetport and Grimesland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
